title: President Donald J. Trump Keeps His Promise To Open U.S. Embassy In Jerusalem, Israel – The White House
content:
Fact Sheets			

		Foreign Policy	

Issued on:
May 14, 2018
Today, we finally acknowledge the obvious: that Jerusalem is Israel’s capital.
						President Donald J. Trump					FULFILLING A PROMISE: President Trump kept his promise by recognizing Jerusalem as Israel’s capital and opening the U.S. Embassy there.STRIVING FOR PEACE: The Trump Administration continues to work to achieve a comprehensive peace agreement between the Israelis and the Palestinians.FULFILLING PROMISES QUICKLY AND EFFICIENTLY: After announcing the United States’ recognition of Jerusalem as the capital of Israel, President Trump quickly and efficiently opened the Embassy in Israel at a low cost to taxpayers.
